channel.title: How do you make cool images?
channel.description: I'm a noob when it comes to making images on the computer. I really want to know how people make cool images such as: [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/e0bif.png[/img] And... [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/263bo0i.jpg[/img] Also, there's MUCH more. I want to know how people make pictures cool like those.

item.title: How do you make cool images?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:23, topic:310180”][quote author=1336.9 link=topic=406619.msg3007083#msg3007083 date=1256491492]
Meh, they can’t do anything to you for downloading torrents lol, I download daily.

Torrent sites owners don’t get put in jail, why would you?
[/quote]

because your cheating 100’s of companies out of Millions of pounds/dollars, by downloading torrented software…[/quote]

who gives a fuck, most people in Africa don’t make jack shit their entire life, and those big American companies make $10000 in 3 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make cool images?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Lust.BS, post:16, topic:310180”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=406619.msg3004504#msg3004504 date=1256265999]

I don’t have the money for that! And I’m not going to illegally download it/unlock the key thing. I’m done with illegal stuff.

Why?

It’s just not worth it anymore. I don’t like risking myself, also, I want to get in to a good college when I grow up and I don’t want them to turn me down for some illegal stuff I did back in the day. Okay, I know that sounded a little bit ridiculous, but illegal stuff is just not my thing anymore. I removed all of the illegal songs from my iPod, I uninstalled LimeWire and all of the illegal things on my computer, permanently removed anything RuneScape Private Server/Client related from my computer meaning no Flamed Fury anymore. I’m just done.
[/quote]

Then you best get off of private servers, because technically it’s copyright?[/quote] He removed private servers off his computer. He quitted mopar anyways.

OFFTOPIC: Lust.BS you got owned.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make cool images?

I removed all of the illegal songs from my iPod, I uninstalled LimeWire and all of the illegal things on my computer, permanently removed anything RuneScape Private Server/Client related from my computer meaning no Flamed Fury anymore. I’m just done.[/quote]

Then you best get off of private servers, because technically it’s copyright?

item.title: How do you make cool images?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:6, topic:310180”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=406619.msg3004452#msg3004452 date=1256261013]
I don’t have the money for that! And I’m not going to illegally download it/unlock the key thing. I’m done with illegal stuff.
[/quote]

Why?[/quote]
It’s just not worth it anymore. I don’t like risking myself, also, I want to get in to a good college when I grow up and I don’t want them to turn me down for some illegal stuff I did back in the day. Okay, I know that sounded a little bit ridiculous, but illegal stuff is just not my thing anymore. I removed all of the illegal songs from my iPod, I uninstalled LimeWire and all of the illegal things on my computer, permanently removed anything RuneScape Private Server/Client related from my computer meaning no Flamed Fury anymore. I’m just done.
